subject: Follow Up
description_text:
I’m just trying to get a follow up on a replacement sequential shifter that had broken. 



Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: I just wanted to make sure that the order number came through. Thanks, Robert Sent from my iPhone

Hi Robert Chappell,  Hello, as it is currently the National Day holiday, we are unable to ship at the moment. We will send you the replacement spring immediately on October 9th. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused.

Okay, 

How hard is it to replace that’s spring?

I don’t want to mess anything up and be out of a shifter. I’ve already been out for a week. 

Can we do a replacement for the whole shifter? 

A previous email said something about sending a replacement from the US. 

Thanks,
Robert 
Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Robert Chappell,    It’s not difficult to replace — we’ll provide you with a video guide to help you replace it easily.

Okay, I just don’t want to spend much time on something I bought that should have lasted longer than 3 months. 

Hopefully the new torsion spring is more reliable than the old. 

Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Robert Chappell,    We’re very sorry for the inconvenience caused.  After you complete the replacement, we’ll compensate you USD 15.
ID 为 4226, 4243 and 4503 的工单已被合并至该工单。

合并来自工单4226  
      主题: SIMSONN SQ pro shifter  
      描述:  To whom this may concern:  I ordered the Simsonn SQ Pro Sim Racing Shifter with 13 CM handle through Amazon on June 11th and it was delivered June 18th, 2025.   The spring to return to center has broken and I’m not sure what is the next step. What is the warranty for this product? I feel like this should have last much longer.   Thanks,  Robert Chappell   Sent from my iPhone

合并来自工单4243  
      主题: Re: SIMSONN SQ pro shifter  
      描述:  
 Order placed 
  June 11, 2025  
  Order # 
  113-1557467-6675464 
  On Sep 28, 2025, at 11:58 PM, General and sales enquiries <service@simsonn.com> wrote:  
 
 
  ﻿

 
Hi, 
 Could you please provide us with your order ID? The picture can't see clearly. We will rreship a new one to you from our US warehouse. 
   
 
   service@simsonn.com   
 
   
  
 
From: Robert Chappell
 
 
Date: 2025-09-29 10:39 
 
To: service
 
 
Subject: SIMSONN SQ pro shifter 
  
 
 To whom this may concern: 
   
 I ordered the Simsonn SQ Pro Sim Racing Shifter with 13 CM handle through Amazon on June 11th and it was delivered June 18th, 2025.  
   
 The spring to return to center has broken and I’m not sure what is the next step. What is the warranty for this product? I feel like this should have last much longer.  
  Thanks,  
 Robert Chappell 
   
   
   
 Sent from my iPhone

合并来自工单4503  
      主题: Re: SIMSONN SQ pro shifter  
      描述: Do you have the shipping address?   Sent from my iPhone 
 
  On Sep 29, 2025, at 7:54 AM, Robert Chappell <chappellr1@icloud.com> wrote:  
 
 
  ﻿
 
 Order placed 
  June 11, 2025  
  Order # 
  113-1557467-6675464 
  On Sep 28, 2025, at 11:58 PM, General and sales enquiries <service@simsonn.com> wrote:  
 
 
  ﻿

 
Hi, 
 Could you please provide us with your order ID? The picture can't see clearly. We will rreship a new one to you from our US warehouse. 
   
 
   service@simsonn.com   
 
   
  
 
From: Robert Chappell
 
 
Date: 2025-09-29 10:39 
 
To: service
 
 
Subject: SIMSONN SQ pro shifter 
  
 
 To whom this may concern: 
   
 I ordered the Simsonn SQ Pro Sim Racing Shifter with 13 CM handle through Amazon on June 11th and it was delivered June 18th, 2025.  
   
 The spring to return to center has broken and I’m not sure what is the next step. What is the warranty for this product? I feel like this should have last much longer.  
  Thanks,  
 Robert Chappell 
   
   
   
 Sent from my iPhone
When should I receive this part? I have been without a shifter for two weeks. This is kind of disappointing, Robert Sent from my iPhone

Hi Robert Chappell,  Hello, I’m currently checking with our operations team. Since our National Day holiday was from October 1st to 8th, I’m confirming whether the replacement parts were shipped before the holiday. Once I receive a reply, I’ll get back to you immediately.
Hi Robert Chappell,  Here is the tracking number : SF6045961676671, the shipping carrier is SF Express, you can track it via https://www.sf-international.com/cn/en/support/querySupport/waybill
What happened to shipping one from the US in this email? It’s going on three weeks with no shifter. Thanks, Robert Sent from my iPhone

Hi Robert Chappell,  We’ve already shipped the spring to you via express delivery, with UPS handling the final delivery stage. It should arrive very soon. As our U.S. warehouse currently doesn’t have this spare part in stock, the package was sent from another warehouse.
My original understanding was that I was going to get a full replacement. This whole interaction has been very underwhelming. Sent from my iPhone

Hi Robert Chappell,     You can try replacing the part first — the process is quite simple. We will also offer you a partial compensation for it.      I’ve provided two replacement videos for your reference.      https://drive.google.com/file/d/15CFmRx99jD5XLC79d6UZ8R7KdaxytMZ2/view?usp=drive_link  https://drive.google.com/file/d/1fiEh5ov6qwUDfHvnrEhi1jYj0jF7GIeK/view?usp=drive_link

Okay. I’m still currently waiting on this part. This will put me out for over a month. If you all know iRacing, it’s subscription based. With everything. I have it just sitting there and not being used. Sent from my iPhone
Hi Robert Chappell,  I understand iRacing and completely understand your situation. We’ll compensate you for your iRacing monthly subscription fee as an apology for the inconvenience.

Not really, I want to race and I want me shifter to work that I bought. It shouldn’t have broken that quickly, after seeing all the reviews I should have went a different route. I run your pedals and they’re excellent. Sent from my iPhone

Just got the spring installed after a couple days. It’s definitely tough when you don’t have the right tools. I had to go purchase a tool kit. How are you going to reimburse for my time and tools? I’m really hoping this spring that was sent is a little better than the last one. Thanks, Robert Sent from my iPhone
Hi Robert Chappell,  We would like to offer you a compensation of $15. Please provide your PayPal account information.
I was told at least $20 in a previous email. https://www.paypal.me/rchapp87 Sent from my iPhone
Hi Robert Chappell,    We have paid 20 USD.
